original_text: John said to the people, ‘Another person will come soon. He is much greater than I am. I am not good enough even to undo his shoes for him.
korean_text: 그가 전파하여 이르되 나보다 능력 많으신 이가 내 뒤에 오시나니 나는 굽혀 그의 신발끈을 풀기도 감당하지 못하겠노라

sentences.original_text: He is much greater than I am
even to undo his shoes for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 신발 끈을 풀어 드릴 자격도
